name: Cat with sonar
description:
You're playing with a humanoid-cat, and you need to found the sounds that the tower has sanded you as a task. Every loop you're done you will become closer to the final where you can bring you safe home

I made this game at Global Game Jame  29-31/01/21.  them: "lost and found"

It was my firs try to make a game in 48 hours and I like how it's ended. I don't know if it's worth to work more on it and transform in an actual game so if you like it let me know, I'm glad to here every type of critic.

link for GGJ https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/meeeeoooowhelp-5?token=1612285698

Thanks!
